description: Default values for airflow. Declare variables to be passed into your templates.

fullnameOverride.description: Provide a name to substitute for the full names of resources

nameOverride.description: Override the name of the chart

airflowHome.description: Airflow home directory. Used for mount paths.

defaultAirflowRepository.description: Default airflow repository. Overrides all the specific images below.

airflowVersion.description: Airflow version (Used to make some decisions based on Airflow Version being deployed).

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for all pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for all pods.

labels.description: Add common labels to all objects and pods defined in this chart.

web.description: Configuration for the Ingress of the web Service.

path.description: The path for the web Ingress.

host.description: The hostname for the web Ingress.

enabled.description: Enable TLS termination for the web Ingress.

secretName.description: The name of a pre-created Secret containing a TLS private key and certificate.

precedingPaths.description: HTTP paths to add to the web Ingress before the default path.

succeedingPaths.description: HTTP paths to add to the web Ingress after the default path.

flower.description: Configuration for the Ingress of the flower Service.

path.description: The path for the flower Ingress.

host.description: The hostname for the flower Ingress.

enabled.description: Enable TLS termination for the flower Ingress.

secretName.description: The name of a pre-created Secret containing a TLS private key and certificate.

precedingPaths.description: HTTP paths to add to the flower Ingress before the default path.

succeedingPaths.description: HTTP paths to add to the flower Ingress after the default path.

airflowPodAnnotations.description: Extra annotations to apply to all Airflow pods.

airflowConfigAnnotations.description: Extra annotations to apply to the main Airflow configmap.

rbac.description: Enable RBAC (default on most clusters these days).

create.description: Specifies whether RBAC resources should be created.

allowPodLaunching.description: Whether various Airflow components launch pods.

pgbouncerExporter.description: Configuration of the PgBouncer exporter image.

pullPolicy.description: The PgBouncer exporter image pull policy.

env.description: Environment variables for all Airflow containers.

extraEnv.description: Extra env 'items' that will be added to the definition of Airflow containers; a string is expected (can be templated).

extraEnvFrom.description: Extra envFrom 'items' that will be added to the definition of Airflow containers; a string is expected (can be templated).

extraSecrets.description: Extra secrets that will be managed by the chart.

additionalProperties.description: Name of the secret (can be templated).

data.description: Content **as string** for the 'data' item of the secret (can be templated)

stringData.description: Content **as string** for the 'stringData' item of the secret (can be templated)

extraConfigMaps.description: Extra ConfigMaps that will be managed by the chart.

additionalProperties.description: Name of the configMap (can be templated).

data.description: Content **as string** for the 'data' item of the secret (can be templated)

brokerUrl.description: Direct url to the redis broker (when using an external redis instance).

fernetKey.description: The Fernet key used to encrypt passwords.

ccacheMountPath.description: Path to mount shared volume for kerberos credentials cache.

ccacheFileName.description: Name for kerberos credentials cache file.

configPath.description: Path to mount krb5.conf kerberos configuration file.

keytabPath.description: Path to mount the keytab for refreshing credentials in the kerberos sidecar.

principal.description: Principal to use when refreshing kerberos credentials.

reinitFrequency.description: How often (in seconds) airflow kerberos will reinitialize the credentials cache.

replicas.description: Number of Airflow Celery workers in StatefulSet.

updateStrategy.description: Specifies the strategy used to replace old Pods by new ones when deployed as a StatefulSet.

strategy.description: Specifies the strategy used to replace old Pods by new ones when deployed as a Deployment.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the worker Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

enabled.description: Allow KEDA autoscaling. `Persistence.enabled` must be set to false to use KEDA.

namespaceLabels.description: Labels used in `matchLabels` for namespace in the PgBouncer NetworkPolicy.

pollingInterval.description: How often KEDA polls the airflow DB to report new scale requests to the HPA.

cooldownPeriod.description: How many seconds KEDA will wait before scaling to zero.

maxReplicaCount.description: Maximum number of workers created by KEDA.

storageClassName.description: If using a custom StorageClass, pass name ref to all StatefulSets here.

fixPermissions.description: Execute init container to chown log directory. This is currently only needed in kind, due to usage of local-path provisioner.

enabled.description: Enable Kerberos sidecar for the worker.

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Grace period for tasks to finish after SIGTERM is sent from Kubernetes.

safeToEvict.description: This setting tells Kubernetes that it's ok to evict when it wants to scale a node down.

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for worker pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for worker pods.

replicas.description: Airflow 2.0 allows users to run multiple schedulers. This feature is only recommended for MySQL 8+ and PostgreSQL

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the scheduler Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

safeToEvict.description: This setting tells Kubernetes that its ok to evict when it wants to scale a node down.

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for scheduler pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for scheduler pods.

createUserJob.description: Airflow job to create a user settings.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the create user job Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

migrateDatabaseJob.description: Airflow job to migrate databases settings.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the migrate database job Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

allowPodLogReading.description: Allow webserver to read k8s pod logs. Useful when you don't have an external log store.

replicas.description: How many Airflow webserver replicas should run.

strategy.description: Specifies the strategy used to replace old Pods by new ones.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the webserver Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

webserverConfig.description: This will be mounted into the Airflow webserver as a custom `webserver_config.py`. You can bake a `webserver_config.py` in to your image instead.
examples:
from airflow import configuration as conf

# The SQLAlchemy connection string.
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = conf.get('core', 'SQL_ALCHEMY_CONN')

# Flask-WTF flag for CSRF
CSRF_ENABLED = True

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for webserver pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for webserver pods.

secretName.description: A secret containing the user and password pair.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the worker Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for Flower pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for Flower pods.

extraAnnotations.description: Extra annotations for the StatsD Service.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the StatsD Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for StatsD pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for StatsD pods.

maxClientConn.description: Maximum clients that can connect to PgBouncer (higher = more file descriptors).

extraAnnotations.description: Extra annotations for the PgBouncer Service.

ciphers.description: The allowed ciphers, might be 'fast', 'normal' or list ciphers separated with ':'.

key.description: Private key used to authenticate with the server

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the worker Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for PgBouncer pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for PgBouncer pods.

redis.description: Configuration for the Redis provisioned by the chart.

enabled.description: Enable the Redis provisioned by the chart (you can also use an external Redis instance with `data.brokerUrl` or `data.brokerUrlSecretName`).

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Grace period for Redis to exit after SIGTERM is sent from Kubernetes.

storageClassName.description: If using a custom StorageClass, pass name ref to all StatefulSets here.

password.description: If password is set, create secret with it, else generate a new one on install.

safeToEvict.description: This setting tells Kubernetes that its ok to evict when it wants to scale a node down.

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for Redis pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for Redis pods.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the worker Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

registry.description: Auth secret for a private registry. This is used if pulling Airflow images from a private registry.

secretName.description: A secret containing the connection string.

limits.description: Define default/max/min values for pods and containers in namespace.

cleanup.description: This runs as a CronJob to cleanup old pods.

nodeSelector.description: Select certain nodes for cleanup pods.

affinity.description: Specify scheduling constraints for cleanup pods.

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created.

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the release name.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the cleanup CronJob Kubernetes ServiceAccount.

config.description: Settings to go into the mounted airflow.cfg

multiNamespaceMode.description: Whether the KubernetesExecutor can launch workers and pods in multiple namespaces

enabled.description: Enable persistent volume for storing dags.

storageClassName.description: If using a custom StorageClass, pass name here.

accessMode.description: Access mode of the persistent volume.

existingClaim.description: The name of an existing PVC to use.

excludeWebserver.description: Disable Git sync on webserver as it is not needed when DAG Serialization is enabled.

maxFailures.description: The number of consecutive failures allowed before aborting.

subPath.description: Subpath within the repo where dags are located.

wait.description: Interval between git sync attempts in seconds.

uid.description: Git sync container run as user parameter.

extraVolumeMounts.description: Mount additional volumes into git sync container.

credentialsSecret.description: Name of a Secret containing the repo `GIT_SYNC_USERNAME` and `GIT_SYNC_PASSWORD`.

sshKeySecret.description: Name of a Secret containing the repo `sshKeySecret`.

knownHosts.description: When using a ssh private key, the contents of your `known_hosts` file.

enabled.description: Enable persistent volume for storing logs.

storageClassName.description: If using a custom StorageClass, pass name here.

existingClaim.description: The name of an existing PVC to use.
